name: slackwolf
description: A Slack bot that moderates Werewolf games

scripts.docker:bash: docker exec -it `docker ps | grep slackwolf_server | awk '{print $1}'` bash
scripts.docker:init: npm run docker:update && npm run docker:start && npm run docker:bash
scripts.docker:kill: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:rm
scripts.docker:mysql: docker exec -it `docker ps | grep mysql | awk '{print $1}'` bash
scripts.production: scripts/wait_for_db && npm run migrate:up && NODE_ENV=production npm start
